timeline.message: feat: Create initial certificates UI page.
feat: Implement redux actions for certificates.
feat: Add a last updated timestamp for certificates.
feat: Add Alias column and hide copy functionality.
feat: Add label and description to dynamically loaded components.
refactor: Remove the check for volumes since the database container uses it.

replies.bodyText: no with the database container defining the volume PGDATA and docker-compose isn't going to be supported we don't have to verify that we can write to the volume. The encryption data is stored as secrets.  The accumulator has the last runtime stored in the database.  So we should be good here to remove this.
replies.author: psantos1113

timeline.bodyText: Can you make these absolute paths?
timeline.author: jamesrichard91
